title: Lenovo just announced its first Snapdragon-powered ThinkPad, the X13s
content:
It’s Mobile World Congress, and while there are lots of announcements, some are like clockwork. Once again, Lenovo is announcing a wide array of ThinkPads in Barcelona, including the ThinkPad X13s Gen 1, a new ThinkPad X1 Extreme, a ThinkPad T14, ThinkPad T14s, and even some new P-series laptops. There are also a couple of

The post Lenovo just announced its first Snapdragon-powered ThinkPad, the X13s appeared first on xda-developers.
description: As tends to be the case at MWC, Lenovo announced a range of new ThinkPads, including one that has a Snapdragon 8cx Gen 3 chipset.
